label: Description
value: At left: left half of an escutcheon on top of an arch, a cherub peeks from behind a scrollwork frame, a garland emerges from behind him. At right: left half of a palmette of acanthus beside a scroll. Above the latter: sketch for part of the escutcheon at left, sketch of acanthus leaves. Below: an unfinished design similar to the on above it. Pen scribbles above at left.

Project for a wall decoration (Female figures and putti support medallion with coat of arms)

label: Description
value: Four female figures with flowing robes support the circular medallion at center. Two of the figures are below, and two are on either side of the medallion. Three winged putti support the medallion on the left. On the medallion is a tower between two stars.

label: Physical description
value: Red crayon, blotted and wash, pen and ink on paper

Project for a wall decoration (Female figures and putti support a circular medallion with coat of arms)

label: Description
value: Very similar to drawing in -1783. Four female figures surround a circular medallion decorated with a coat of arms, a tower between two stars. Four putti support the medallion.

label: Physical description
value: Red crayon, blotted and wash on paper

Oblong with dancing children; an oblong panel with an escutcheon

label: Description
value: Vertical rectangle. A horizontal oblong with three dancing children. At right is one blowing into a trumpet. Below is a scrollwork frame of a [?] ovoid. On top is a helmet, whose mantling ends with ribbons and tassels. Two framing lines. Verso: Most of the right half is executed; the left one roughly outlined. Five persons, possibly all women, sit at a table in the open country. One of them raises a glass. At right is a tree, a house in the background.

label: Physical description
value: Charcoal, pen, ink, brush, grey watercolor, paper

label: Credit line
value: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
Design for a Painted Ceiling of Irregular Shape: Aurora

label: Description
value: Design for a painted ceiling, viewed directly from below.  The central circular decoration shows Aurora (a winged figure riding in a chariot pulled by two horses; a putto with a burning torch flies in front of her).  The scene is placed within a tromp l'oeil architectural framework.  At each corner, an illusionary lunette with a pointed arch contains a bust on a pedestal: Orpheus for Music, Homer for Poetry, Apelles for Painting, and Vitruvius for Architecture.

label: Physical description
value: Pen and brown and black ink, brush and watercolor, black chalk on paper

label: Credit line
value: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

Hebe Offering a Drink to Zeus

label: Description
value: Sitting god extends his right hand with bowl towards Hebe, who stands pouring ambrosia with both hands from pitcher. Juno appears beside Zeus. Putti with trumpets standing around. Above are flying putti with flowers, below two putti support dish with fruit. Below in right corner, sketch of part of young man extending his right arm.

label: Physical description
value: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper

label: Credit line
value: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
Design for Wall or Ceiling Decoration with Bacchus, Hymen and Venus

label: Description
value: Hymen standing, embraces Dionysos with right arm and raises torch with his left arm. At left Dionysos sits upon throne, together with lion; he leans left hand upon pitcher, supports hand thyrsos with right.  At right Venus sits, holding a wreath with each hand. Upon clouds in foreground at left, the mask of satyr, with tamborine and other musical instrument on vine.  At right, two kissing doves. Below caption: "Imene Bacco e Venere." Verso: perhaps written by Giani, "26" and "44."

label: Physical description
value: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown and gray wash, black chalk, graphite on off-white laid paper

label: Credit line
value: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
Ceiling Design Depicting Iris and the Rainbow

label: Description
value: Iris flies with arms extended below a rainbow and above a thunderstorm. Beside her at left flies a putto with leaves in his hands, at right, two wind deities blow clouds.

label: Physical description
value: Pen and brown ink, brush and watercolor on off-white laid paper

label: Description
value:
(A) Profile of a man walking towards right, his left arm raised, right arm lowered, a nimbus glowing above his head.
(B) Reverse: right leg of a seated man, part of a left arm, front view of left foot, profile view of right foot, part of drapery.

A Canopied Ceiling with Aurora in Central Panel

label: Description
value: Canopy scheme. Ovoid medallion showing rising of sun in center. Motif is surrounded by festoons. An otherwise undecorated white tent or one with stripes and other decorations, especially pairs of puttos facing the corners. Pairs of putti and altar shown in the corners on blue ground. Moldings outside.
